strings.Value: "Before deciding her fate, I want to ask some questions."
"Tell me about the Technic League."
"What are you doing in this part of the world?"
"Why did you have these two in chains?"
"I don't have any more questions."
"It's a right thing — to punish your tormenter. Kill her, Regongar."
"She pissed me off. I will finish her myself."
"I will spare her life. Go back to Numeria!"
"Is it normal for the Technic League to grab random people from the road to enslave them?"
"As the future lawful ruler of these lands, I want to practice carrying out public executions!"
"Sarenrae teaches us to have mercy upon the repentant... but I see no repentance in her."
"Shelyn teaches us to have mercy upon the repentant... but I see no repentance in her."
"Calistria teaches us to never forgive those who have wronged us. Go on, Regongar — take your revenge!"
"She's the epitome of evil, unable to repent — in the name of Iomedae, I'll execute her myself!"
{n}Kalannah drops her weapon and raises her hands, which are covered in blood.{/n} "Mercy! Don't kill me!"
{n}The half-orc bares his fangs.{/n} "That is how you talk now, wretch! I've wanted to do this for so long..." {n}He casts a spell on his outstretched palm, and sparks begin dancing upon it.{/n}
{n}The half-elf puts her hand on his shoulder.{/n} "Regongar... Come now, let her go. It's one thing to kill her in battle, but executing her unarmed... Why spoil the joy of being free?"

"Octavia, are you out of your mind? This filth is from the {g|Technic League}Technic League{/g}! By her own hand she enchained us! And you want to forgive her? Do you think she'll thank you? Ha! She'll just gather another band and try to catch us again!"
"I will tell you everything! I know much! You will see. I am more use to you alive than dead!"

"It is an ancient alliance of wizards and scholars of the {g|Numeria}Numerian{/g} wastelands and its technologies. We are the mightiest organization in the whole of Numeria! We possess powers that the uninitiated could only dream of, and our agents are everywhere — not just in Numeria! Believe me, these are not people you want as enemies."

"Because we own them! The {g|Technic League}Technic League{/g} spent vast sums of money on these two. We nurtured them, fed and treated them, even taught them magic for many years. They cost us a fortune, and we're not going to just set them free, whatever your local customs say. We are fully in our rights!"

"I was sent by Maestro Janush. He is a very important person and a mighty wizard, who taught these two ungrateful slaves everything they know! He will be furious to find out they are free, and will certainly find the one who stole the {g|Technic League}Technic League's{/g} property. Believe me, he does not need me for that — whether you kill me or not, he'll find you in no time!"
"You see now what a slimeball she is? Step aside, let me fry her!"
{n}The half-orc bares his fangs in a grin of triumph, and raises his hand, lightning sparkling.{/n} "I zap thee with my heart".
{n}The half-orc shrugs.{/n} "Fine, fine... The victor's always right!"
{n}Regongar strikes Kalannah across the face.{/n} "Get out of my sight, you filth! Thank the gods that my friends are so soft!"
"Listen to me. Do not make any hasty decisions. I am an important person in the {g|Technic League}Technic League{/g}. I have connections! You will benefit from such an ally!"

{n}Kalannah shrugs.{/n} "The {g|Technic League}Technic League{/g} is so strong because it is never ashamed of taking what it needs, whatever the laws may say. We were missing a slave. We underestimated you. That was a mistake, of course. I apologize."
"Sounds promising..."
"Only cowards with no honor reckon sheer power a good reason for an alliance!"
{n}Jaethal rises her eyebrow, but doesn't grace Valerie with an answer.{/n}
"Sparing a repentant sinner is a good deed, but I hear no repentance in her words. She seeks impunity, not mercy."
"You say this magistro guy of yours will find us anyway? Then I guess we don't get anything out of sparing you!"
"You'd best not anger the Maestro! If you kill me, he'll be furious!"
"Oh, I'm so scared! You know, I actually like getting slavers and other assholes angry with me — then I get to cut them to pieces!"

"I repent! I swear, I repent! As soon as I get back to {g|Numeria}Numeria{/g}, I'll give a fat donation to every good deity's temple. {g|Sarenrae}Sarenrae{/g}, {g|Shelyn}Shelyn{/g}, {g|Iomedae}Iomedae{/g} — whatever you want, just let me go!"
